trans-unit.source: A much more thorough SQL script to add a column with a default value is below including checking if the column exists before adding it also checkin the constraint and dropping it if there is one. This script also names the constraint so we can have a nice naming convention (I like DF_) and if not SQL will give us a constraint with a name which has a randomly generated number; so it's nice to be able to name the constraint too.
trans-unit.target: 下面有一个更彻底的SQL脚本来添加一个带默认值的列,包括在添加前检查该列是否存在,如果有的话,还可以检查约束,如果有的话就把它丢掉。这个脚本还为约束命名,这样我们就可以有一个很好的命名习惯(我喜欢DF_),如果没有的话,SQL会给我们的约束加上一个随机生成的数字的名字;所以能够给约束命名也是很好的。

trans-unit.source: Add a column to the table (or click on the column you want to update if it already exists)
trans-unit.target: 在表格中添加一个列(如果已经存在,也可以点击你要更新的列)。

trans-unit.target: 此外,如果你想将相同的列(如果它不存在的话)添加到数据库中的所有表,那就使用。

trans-unit.source: As well as you can use SQL Server Management Studio also by right clicking table in the Design menu, setting the default value to table.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以通过右键单击“设计”菜单中的表格，将默认值设置为表格来使用SQL Server Management Studio 。

trans-unit.source: Bang up pops a little window with, you guessed it, the properly formatted guaranteed-to-work change script. Hit the easy button.
trans-unit.target: 弹出一个小窗口,弹出一个小窗口,你猜对了,格式正确的保证工作的更改脚本。点击简单的按钮。

trans-unit.source: Beware when the column you are adding has a NOT NULL constraint, yet does not have a DEFAULT constraint (value). The ALTER TABLE statement will fail in that case if the table has any rows in it. The solution is to either remove the NOT NULL constraint from the new column, or provide a DEFAULT constraint for it.
trans-unit.target: 当您要添加的列具有 NOT NULL 约束但没有 DEFAULT 约束（值）时要当心。 如果表中有任何行，则 ALTER TABLE 语句将在这种情况下失败。 解决方案是从新列中删除 NOT NULL 约束，或者为其提供 DEFAULT 约束。

trans-unit.source: Example:
trans-unit.target: Example:

trans-unit.source: From this query you can add a column of datatype integer with default value 0.
trans-unit.target: 在这个查询中,你可以添加一个数据类型为整数的列,默认值为0。

trans-unit.source: Here TaskSheet is the particular table name and IsBilledToClient is the new column which you are going to insert and 1 the default value. That means in the new column what will be the value of the existing rows, therefore one will be set automatically there. However, you can change as you wish with the respect of the column type like I have used BIT, so I put in default value 1.
trans-unit.target: 这里 TaskSheet 是特定的表名， IsBilledToClient 是您要插入的新列，默认值为 1 。 这意味着在新列中将是现有行的值，因此将在此处自动设置一个值。 但是，您可以根据需要更改列类型，就像我使用 BIT 一样 ，因此我将默认值设置为1。

trans-unit.source: Here is another way to add a column to an existing database table with a default value.
trans-unit.target: 下面是另一种方法,在现有的数据库表中添加一个默认值的列。

trans-unit.source: How can I add a column with a default value to an existing table in SQL Server 2000 / SQL Server 2005?
trans-unit.target: 如何在SQL Server 2000 / SQL Server 2005中的现有表中添加具有默认值的列？

trans-unit.source: I suggest the above system, because I have faced a problem. So what is the problem? The problem is, if the IsBilledToClient column does exists in the table table then if you execute only the portion of the code given below you will see an error in the SQL server Query builder. But if it does not exist then for the first time there will be no error when executing.
trans-unit.target: 我建议使用上述系统，因为我遇到了问题。 那是什么问题呢？ 问题是，如果 IsBilledToClient 确实存在IsBilledToClient列，那么，如果仅执行下面给出的部分代码，则会在SQL Server查询构建器中看到错误。 但是，如果它不存在，那么在执行时将第一次没有错误。

trans-unit.source: I've found that doing the entire thing in one statement will lock out one of our more active tables for 4-8 minutes and quite often I have killed the process. This method each part usually takes only a few seconds and causes minimal locking.
trans-unit.target: 我发现在一个语句中做整个事情会把我们的一个比较活跃的表锁住4-8分钟,很多时候我都会把这个过程杀死。这种方法每个部分通常只需要几秒钟的时间,而且会导致最小的锁定。

trans-unit.source: If you insert a Record into SomeTable and do not Specify SomeCol's value, then it will Default to 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果将Record插入 SomeTable 中并且未指定 SomeCol 的值，则它将默认为 0 。

trans-unit.source: If you leave out CONSTRAINT D_SomeTable_SomeCol then SQL Server will autogenerate
trans-unit.target: 如果省略 CONSTRAINT D_SomeTable_SomeCol ,则SQL Server将自动生成

trans-unit.source: The WITH VALUES is only needed when your Column is Nullable
trans-unit.target: 仅当您的列可为空时，才需要 WITH VALUES

trans-unit.source: The MSDN article ALTER TABLE (Transact-SQL) has all of the alter table syntax.
trans-unit.target: MSDN文章ALTER TABLE（Transact-SQL）具有所有alter table语法。

trans-unit.source: The inclusion of the DEFAULT fills the column in existing rows with the default value, so the NOT NULL constraint is not violated.
trans-unit.target: 包含DEFAULT将使用默认值填充现有行中的列，因此不会违反NOT NULL约束。

trans-unit.source: The most basic version with two lines only
trans-unit.target: 最基本的版本,只有两行

trans-unit.source: The reason for this is if you update a large scale table and add a new not null field it has to write to every single row and hereby will lock out the entire table as it adds the column and then writes all the values.
trans-unit.target: 原因是如果你更新了一个大规模的表,并添加了一个新的非空字段,它必须写到每一行,因此会锁住整个表,因为它添加了该列,然后写入所有的值。

trans-unit.source: The table is created and a column is added to an existing table with a default value.
trans-unit.target: 创建表格,并在现有的表格中添加一列默认值。

trans-unit.source: These are two ways to add a column to an existing database table with a default value.
trans-unit.target: 这两种方法可以在现有的数据库表中添加一个默认值的列。

trans-unit.source: This can be done by the below code.
trans-unit.target: 这可以通过下面的代码来实现。

trans-unit.target: 这也可以在SSMS GUI中进行。我在下面显示了一个默认的日期,但默认值当然可以是什么都可以。

trans-unit.source: This has a lot of answers, but I feel the need to add this extended method. This seems a lot longer, but it is extremely useful if you're adding a NOT NULL field to a table with millions of rows in an active database.
trans-unit.target: 这个有很多答案,但我觉得有必要添加这个扩展方法。这个方法看起来很长,但如果你要在活动数据库中的表中添加一个NOT NULL字段,这个方法是非常有用的。

trans-unit.source: This is for SQL Server:
trans-unit.target: 这是针对SQL Server的。

trans-unit.source: This method will add the nullable column which operates a lot faster by itself, then fills the data before setting the not null status.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法将添加nullable列,它本身的操作速度会快很多,然后在设置non-null状态之前填充数据。

trans-unit.source: This will add a new column into the Table.
trans-unit.target: 这将在表中增加一个新的列。

trans-unit.source: To add a column to an existing database table with a default value, we can use:
trans-unit.target: 要给现有的数据库表添加一个默认值的列,我们可以使用。

trans-unit.source: Well, I now have some modification to my previous answer. I have noticed that none of the answers mentioned IF NOT EXISTS. So I am going to provide a new solution of it as I have faced some problems altering the table.
trans-unit.target: 好吧，现在我对以前的答案做了一些修改。 我注意到， IF NOT EXISTS 存在，则没有提到任何答案。 所以我将提供一个新的解决方案，因为我在更改桌子时遇到了一些问题。

trans-unit.source: What this will do is add the column as a nullable field and with the default value, update all fields to the default value (or you can assign more meaningful values), and finally it will change the column to be NOT NULL.
trans-unit.target: 它要做的是将该列添加为nullable字段,并使用默认值,将所有字段更新为默认值(或者你可以指定更有意义的值),最后它将把该列改为NOT NULL。

trans-unit.source: When adding a nullable column, WITH VALUES will ensure that the specific DEFAULT value is applied to existing rows:
trans-unit.target: 添加可为空的列时 ， WITH VALUES 将确保将特定的DEFAULT值应用于现有行：

trans-unit.source: You can do the thing with T-SQL in the following way.
trans-unit.target: 你可以用下面的方式来做T-SQL的事情。

trans-unit.target: 提供选项“ Generate Change Script ”！
